wikipedia_page.main: Harold Howell Lewis (25 October 1910 – 2006) was a Welsh footballer who played as an inside forward for Rochdale, Southend United, Notts County, West Ham United, Swansea Town and Queen of the South. He was also on the reserve team of Arsenal.

response: * Harry Lewis (boxer) (1886–1956), American World Champion Welterweight boxer

* Harry Lewis (Australian footballer) (1880–1946), Australian rules footballer
* Harry Lewis (musician) (1916–1998), English saxophonist and clarinetist
* Wroetoshaw (born 1996), professional name of Harry Lewis, YouTube personality and member of the YouTube group Sidemen
* "The Ballad of Harry Lewis", a comedic song from the album My Son, the Folk Singer, by Alan Sherman
